analysis.description:
Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0xb6d85349ec816726bf07e1690d56d712acabe409.sol#373-384) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/18/0xb6d85349ec816726bf07e1690d56d712acabe409.sol#380-383)

TokenDestructible.destroy (/unique_chucks/18/0xb6d85349ec816726bf07e1690d56d712acabe409.sol#657-667) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,balance) (/unique_chucks/18/0xb6d85349ec816726bf07e1690d56d712acabe409.sol#664-665)
